name: misc-utils-of-mine
description: Miscellaneous utilities for JavaScript/TypeScript that I often use

scripts.build: npx yamat run npm run build
scripts.clean: npx yamat run npm run clean
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.yamat-link: npx yamat link && npm run packageLock && npx yamat run npm i && npm run build && npm test
scripts.yamat-unlink-pack: npm run packageLock && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat unlink --version pack && npx yamat run "rm -rf package-lock.json" && npx yamat run npm i && npm test && npm test
scripts.yamat-patch-publish: npx yamat run "npm version patch" && npx yamat unlink && npx yamat --break-on-error no run npm publish

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
